alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Lorain; Medina; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 4:26PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Cuyahoga, eastern Medina, northern Summit and east central Lorain Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 425 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Parma to near Grafton. Movement was southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rain could cause ponding of water on the roadways. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Medina, Parma, Cuyahoga Falls, Strongsville, Brunswick, North Royalton, Hudson, Twinsburg, Macedonia, Chippewa Lake, Garfield Heights, Maple Heights, Parma Heights, Broadview Heights, Brook Park, Berea, Middleburg Heights, Brecksville and Bedford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
